title: Major shostopper: all JavaScript apps using camera preview will crash after latest Windows Update 10.0.15063.608!
body: Each JavaScript app that uses a Video element in the UI and calls the play() function to stream the video preview from camera to the app page will Crash after recent Windows 10 update 10.0.15063.608

comments.body: The bug applies to all CPU platforms: x64, x86 (on Windows 10 PC alike) and ARM (on Windows 10 Mobile)
